title: Scary Snippets: Sibling Edition
description: hey say blood is thicker than water.But some siblings turn out to be Cain and Abel. Others become Bonnie and Clyde. In this second collection of family horror that focuses on blood battles that have been waged since the dawn of time.Discover wicked stepsisters, bully brothers and take sides in sibling rivalry that is guaranteed to leave no one unscathed. Be sure to check out the first collection so that your whole family can get a glimpse into the dark side that lives within our walls.
author: N.M. Brown
